questions:
What is the photo about?
A) A landscape
B) A puzzle piece of an owl
C) A painting
D) A photograph of an owl

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A completed puzzle
B) A single puzzle piece
C) A puzzle being assembled
D) A puzzle piece missing

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) An animal
C) A puzzle piece
D) A painting

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A completed puzzle
B) A puzzle piece
C) A photograph
D) A painting

What is depicted on the puzzle piece?
A) A landscape
B) A portrait
C) An owl
D) A cat

What is the background of the photo?
A) A park
B) A wooden surface
C) A tablecloth
D) A piece of paper

What is the foreground of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A puzzle piece
C) A photograph
D) A painting

What is the primary color of the background?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) White

What is the primary color on the puzzle piece?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) White

What part of the owl is visible on the puzzle piece?
A) The entire body
B) The head and part of a wing
C) Only the wings
D) Only the feet

What is the shape of the puzzle piece?
A) Square
B) Circular
C) Irregular with knobs and holes
D) Triangular

What is the color of the owl's face?
A) Black
B) White
C) Brown
D) Grey

What is the color of the owl's wings?
A) Black
B) White and brown
C) Brown
D) Grey

What is the background color on the puzzle piece?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) White

What is the texture of the background surface?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Textured
D) Glossy

What is the shape of the holes on the puzzle piece?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Irregular

How many knobs does the puzzle piece have?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

How many holes does the puzzle piece have?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the primary subject of the illustration on the puzzle piece?
A) A landscape
B) An owl bird
C) A building
D) A person

What is the puzzle piece resting on?
A) A table
B) A floor
C) A wooden surface
D) A piece of paper

What is the color of the owl's beak?
A) Black
B) White
C) Brown
D) Yellow

What is the primary material of the background surface?
A) Wood
B) Plastic
C) Metal
D) Fabric
